home.title: Welcome to ParisCareTakerService
home.description: Your perfect solution for short-term rentals in Paris. Find the best places to stay with trusted hosts.

apartments.title: Cozy Studio in Central Paris
apartments.description: A cozy and stylish studio located in the heart of Paris. Perfect for solo travelers or couples.

apartments.title: Luxury Apartment with Eiffel Tower View
apartments.description: Experience luxury living with a stunning view of the Eiffel Tower from your balcony.

apartments.title: Charming Loft in Le Marais
apartments.description: Stay in a charming loft in the trendy Le Marais district, surrounded by shops and cafes.

service_list.title: 24/7 Customer Support
service_list.description: Our team is available around the clock to assist you with any questions or concerns.

service_list.title: High-Quality Cleaning
service_list.description: All our apartments are cleaned to the highest standards to ensure your comfort.

service_list.title: Exclusive Discounts
service_list.description: Enjoy special discounts and offers when you book through our platform.

about.title: About Us
about.description: ParisCareTakerService was founded with the mission to provide high-quality short-term rental options in the beautiful city of Paris. We strive to make every stay memorable by offering exceptional customer service and carefully curated accommodations.
about.additional_info: Our team is passionate about travel and hospitality, and we work tirelessly to ensure that our clients have an unforgettable experience. Whether you are visiting Paris for business or pleasure, we have the perfect place for you.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Contact our team for any questions, reservations, or assistance.
